text: Castelnaudary - Villeneuve Airport (ICAO code: LFMW) is located at Villeneuve- la-Comptal in Aude departement of Occitanie region at 2.5 km south-east of Castelnaudary. A campus of the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university) is located on the aerodrome.Castelnaudary == References == Category:Airports in France Category:Aude
title: Castelnaudary – Villeneuve Airport
